page.title: 10A day on a farm in Beckermet
page.content: I live at Low Godderthwaite Farm with my parents and two older brothers.I get up at 7.20a.m. when my brothers come downstairs.I eat my breakfast of cereal while still in my nightdress.After clearing the breakfast things I brush the chairs.I change into my jeans, shirt,socks and shoes, then mum and I go picking potatoes.We have a special machine called a Potato Harvester.We sort the potatoes from the soil before they are bagged.At 10a.m. we have a break during which we eat cheese sandwiches and cake followed by coffee. Then we continue picking potatoes.We go home to make dinner about noon.After dinner we go Combine Harvesting.I help by leading bales, sometimes I have to drive the tractor.After leading bales all afternoon mum and I make the tea. Then we start milking our herd of cows. I go to bed about 10.30p.m.
